About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a passionate growing Web Developer and Computer Technician with a few skills of working in the information technology and service industry. Currently, I am studying Mobile Web Development and Google Cloud Computing with Pluralsight. I am a self-motivated hard-working individual who can communicate with different people at different levels. As a junior Front-End Developer, I would like to increase my skills utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Angular and other tools to make the best in web development and computer maintenance. I have a good understanding of computer servicing and maintenance on both hardware and software. I have fallen in love with graphics design and I have gained some skills in Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator.

WEB DESIGNER

I love what i do. I take great pride in what i do. I try to use the best tools in creating stunning responsive websites to bring the best user experience on the web. Simplicity is the ultimate.

GRAPHICS DESIGNER

Playing around with Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator i have learnt some skills in making beautiful and profesional business cards, flayers, invitation cards, logos, latterheads, calenders and some photo editing to meet the customers needs.

COMPUTER TECHNICION

Do It Yourself (DIY), has been an inbuilt skill which made me want to know more on how the computers are built, with that in mind I went on to explore mobile phones and computers starting with my own.
